price: Na katika khabari za Musa, tulipo mtuma kwa Firauni na hoja wazi.
arabic: وَفِي مُوسَىٰٓ إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٖ
footnotes: Na katika kisa cha Musa yapo mawaidha. Tulipo mtuma kwa Firauni, na tukatilia nguvu kwa kumpa ushahidi ulio wazi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wafī mūsā idh arsalnāhu ilā fir'ʿawna bisul'ṭānin mubīnin
